item.description:
Come join us for a hauntingly good time.  For Tots who are almost crawling to 22 months. We will delight in Halloween themed yoga songs and poses that focus on body parts, spatial awareness and seeing other little friends in the room. Let your little one reach for more than just candy this Halloween!  Instead tots (and their parents) can transform themselves into all kinds of things — a pumpkin, a spider, a vampire — without slipping into a costume...although it would be a mighty cute dress rehearsal.

 Imagination is central with lots of stories and props to tie together poses and activities.

No yoga experience is required.

This meetup costs $15 per adult/child.  Additional siblings are $5 each.
item.how_to_find_us: Absolute Yoga, 77 West Main St. 2nd floor. Hopkinton, MA (near 495)
item.name: Tots Spooky yoga
